# INMediaDestinationReference

**Class**

An object that describes the destination for a media item.

## Declaration

```swift
class INMediaDestinationReference
```

## Creating a Media Destination Object

- **library()**: Creates a new library destination for the media item.
- **playlistDestination(withName:)**: Creates a new playlist destination for the media item.

## Describing the Media Destination

- **playlistName**: The name of the playlist to which you add the media.
- **mediaDestinationType**: The destination of the media your app adds.
- **INMediaDestinationType**: Constants that describe the different media destination types.

## Accessing the Media

- **mediaItems**: The media content to add.
- **mediaSearch**: The location to search for the media item to add.
- **mediaDestination**: The location for the media to add.
- **INMediaDestination**: An object that describes the destination for a media item.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
